Package org.joml

Class AxisAngle4d

java.lang.Object
org.joml.AxisAngle4d
All Implemented Interfaces:
Externalizable, Serializable, Cloneable
public class AxisAngle4d extends Object implements Externalizable, Cloneable
Represents a 3D rotation of a given radians about an axis represented as an unit 3D vector.

This class uses double-precision components.

Author:
Kai Burjack
See Also:
  • Serialized Form

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Return a string representation of this AxisAngle4d.

      This method creates a new DecimalFormat on every invocation with the format string " 0.000E0;-".

      Overrides:

      Returns:
      the string representation
